import { useState, useContext, createContext } from 'react' import logo from '../img/RSHS_1_Logo.png' import test from '../img/right_arrow.svg' export default function Sidebar() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const Menus = [ { title: "Dashboard", src: "Chart_fill" }, { title: "Inbox", src: "Chat" }, { title: "Accounts", src: "User", gap: true }, { title: "Schedule ", src: "Calendar" }, { title: "Search", src: "Search" }, { title: "Analytics", src: "Chart" }, { title: "Files ", src: "Folder", gap: true }, { title: "Setting", src: "Setting" }, ]; return ( <>
setOpen(!open)}/>
    {Menus.map((Menu, index) => (
  • {Menu.title}
    • ))}

Home Page

) }
